title: FS Lot of 38 T206s w/ HOFers and tough backs - $1050

posts.post_title: FS Lot of 38 T206s w/ HOFers and tough backs - $1050
posts.post_content:
For sale:
Lot of 38 T206s for sale - $1050 or best offer.  Shipping and delivery confirmation on me. Paypal (prefer Paypal gift) or money order. Please send questions to [URL="vettejayk@aol.com"]vettejayk@aol.com[/URL]. Additional scans or scans of backs available upon request.  Thanks for looking.

This lot includes 3 difficult backs: El Principe De Gales, Tolstoi, and Cycle 460, 1 Southern Leaguer (Manion), 3 major stars (Tinker - HOF, Jimmy Collins, and Hal Chase), and several minor stars.

1 FR-GD
